divs: sighting details"wake-up" where the words whispering in my ears,waking me up from sleep at 5:30 am that bitter cold december morning.i was at another persons' home,so i went to the rear sliding-glass door to "crack" it open and smoke a cigarette.i immediately noticed white lights fading "out" and getting "brighter".unusual lights...so i grabbed a 8mm "digital" video camera and filmed exactly of these "orbs" of lights w\ "bell-shaped" unidentified crafts w\in them.after a half an hour i became bored w\ these crafts and went back to sleep.four months later i reviewed said film and the images startled the s---t out of me (seeing ufos w\in orbs of a single ball of rainbow coloured "light",sillouhetted as "bell-shaped",angling,dashing;playing:"chicken" w\ each other!).i could also hear interferance. i filmed .5 hr. against the full moon,and street lights...skeptics,you can all kiss my arse!i have the (video) proof and (possibly) an implant in the back of my head...the implant was\is from a previous encounter 3 years earlier...of which i have no comment,because they thought they had sedated me,but...(no comments about this event ever).this video is for sale for $3,000 per 1 minute...and it's all or nothing...or,i will eventually show it on public access-myself.this video is copyrighted and "vaulted".i lost sight of these objects because i turned off the camera and went back to bed.these objects are zipping directly at tha camera and away from it.it was 4 months later when i noticed i had ufos on the footage,and not new government "crafts"!
